# beginCollection(withStart:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the workout’s start date and begins building the workout.

## Declaration

```swift
func beginCollection(withStart startDate: Date, completion: @escaping (Bool, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func beginCollection(at startDate: Date) async throws
```

## Starting the workout

- **startDate**: The workout’s start date and time.
- **elapsedTime(at:)**: Calculates the duration of the workout at the specified time.
